        Compute the min/max probability of reaching a target in a PTA, from the initial state, using the backwards reachability method.
        Parameters:
        pta - The PTA
        targetLocs - Target locations
        targetConstraint - Target timing contraint
        min - Min or max probabilities (true=min, false=max)

        PrismException
